solution_line_template: In two weeks, he has to do {normal_chores_two_weeks} chores because {num_weeks_total} x {normal_chores_per_week} = <<{num_weeks_total}*{normal_chores_per_week}={normal_chores_two_weeks}>>{normal_chores_two_weeks}

He now does {total_chores_per_week_new} chores a week because {days_in_week} x {chores_per_day_extra} = <<{days_in_week}*{chores_per_day_extra}={total_chores_per_week_new}>>{total_chores_per_week_new}

He does {total_chores_two_weeks_new} chores in two weeks because {num_weeks_total} x {total_chores_per_week_new} = <<{num_weeks_total}*{total_chores_per_week_new}={total_chores_two_weeks_new}>>{total_chores_two_weeks_new}

He has done {extra_chores_done} extra chores because {total_chores_two_weeks_new} - {normal_chores_two_weeks} = <<{total_chores_two_weeks_new}-{normal_chores_two_weeks}={extra_chores_done}>>{extra_chores_done}
